org.optaplanner.core.api.domain.solution

Annotation Type PlanningEntityProperty


  • @Target(value={METHOD,FIELD})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface PlanningEntityProperty
    Specifies that a property (or a field) on a Solution class is a planning entity.

    The planning entity should have the PlanningEntity annotation. The planning entity will be added to the ScoreDirector.
